Caption: Watch till the end to see what food is served at this all-you-can-eat BBQ buffet dinner!😍 📍The Pearl Hotel KL, Klang Lama #klfoodie #kualalumpur #foodhuntingmalaysia #fypシ #klfoodhunting #malaysiafoodie #klfoodies #klfoodblogger #buffetkl #klbuffet  Here’s some of the highlights from the buffet: 💛 Poached Prawns, Mussels, Bamboo Clams & Fresh Oysters  💛 Baked Cheese Mussel Green 💛 Roasted Lamb 💛 Marinated Lamb Shoulder 💛 Noodle Station (mee curry) 💛 Hot Mains (pasta, fried rice, fried noodles, fried chicken, grilled sausage)  💛 Desserts (local kuihs, cakes, tarts, fruits, ice cream, ice kacang) 💛 Canapés, Salad, Cold Cuts Reserve your table now to secure your dining experience at their exclusive BBQ buffet dinner!❤️ 💸Price - RM118+ per pax (adults); RM58+ per pax (children aged 4-12 years old) - 2 full-paying adults, 1 kid eats for FREE - 20% OFF (senior citizens aged 60 years old & above) 【The Pearl Hotel Kuala Lumpur】 📍Batu 5, Jalan Klang Lama, 58000 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. ⏰Available every Friday & Saturday, 6:30pm - 10.00pm (dine in) ☎️Reservation: +016-331 9375

Love this new supper spot that serves HUGE seafood platter!🤤 📍M. BBQ Puduport, Jalan Pudu (Muslim-friendly: pork-free, lard-free) #klfoodie #kualalumpur #foodhuntingmalaysia #fypシ #klfoodhunting #malaysiafoodie #klfoodies #klfoodblogger #muslimfriendly  Located in Jalan Pudu, M. BBQ Puduport is a new supper spot that serves seafood platter, Japanese + Thai + Western cuisines, and even wagyu beef that melts in-your-mouth!  The seafood platter here is ideal for 4-5 pax, and the price range per pax is only around RM30+! They even have VIP rooms that can accommodate up to 15-20 pax! Definitely one of the BEST supper spots for night owls because they operate till 5am in the morning! Here’s what we had: 1. Seafood Platter - with Fish (RM155)🌟 2. Junior BBQ Seafood Set - 2 pax (RM88)🌟 3. BBQ Skewers - Lamb Satay (RM4 per stick) 4. BBQ Skewers - Chicken Wings (RM5 per pcs) 5. Japanese A5 Miyazaki Wagyu (RM98 per 100g)🌟 6. Jyo Tan Shio (RM38)🌟 7. House Signature Drinks (RM8) 【M.BBQ Puduport】 📍 LOT 370, Jln Pudu, Pudu, 55100 Kuala Lumpur. ⏰ 5pm to 5am daily ✅ Muslim-friendly (pork-free, lard-free) 🚗 Free parking at restaurant entrance

Newest limited edition flavour from Pocky is surprisingly good!🫶🏻 Peach Lychee & Elderflower Sunshine Paradise is a unique flavour indeed!✨  Loved the sweetness from the peach + a touch of sourness from the lychee + a floral aroma of elderflower!😋 #PockyMY #HappinessUnderTheSun  ✅Available at Shopee and at specific outlets: Aeon, Mydin and TF value. 🛒Purchase Link: http://surl.li/hasdn Contest Mechanics (till 15 June only!) 💛Create a refreshing drink using Pocky Sunshine Paradise or any other Pocky flavours. 💛Take a picture of your refreshing masterpiece. 💛Share a picture of your drink on your Instagram or Facebook page and tell them the inspiration behind the drink. (make sure your account is public!) 💛Tag Pocky and hashtag #HappinessUnderTheSun. Prizes 🎁Grand Prize (x3): Pico 4 VR headset (256GB) worth RM2,499 🎁Consolation Prize (x50): Petronas Gift Card worth RM200 #klfoodie #kualalumpur #foodhuntingmalaysia #fypシ #klfoodhunting #malaysiafoodie #klfoodies #klfoodblogger
